mapper.select: SELECT fi.id, fi.folder_id, fi.user_id, fi.content_id, fi.note, fi.sort_order, fi.create_time, c.title as content_title, c.type as content_type, c.description as content_description FROM favorite_item fi INNER JOIN content c ON fi.content_id = c.id WHERE fi.folder_id = #{folderId} AND c.status != 3 ORDER BY fi.sort_order ASC, fi.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
